text: Kwaapfila Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu gheghala na sisila lya ipfinu pfinoghile ipfikutsa, pfelinga na apfila pfa kweli, nambiko tsila tsa Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu itsilapfighwe kwa kuyililayilila chila ghumwaka ng'atsidaha bae kuwatenda wanoghe awala iwomtamanila Imulungu.
